verbose_text: Consistent with this, the present findings were further strengthened by transduction of specific target siRNAs to block autophagy, and knockdown of beclin 1 in combination with XC-302 markedly accelerated proliferation and clone formation of the CNE-2 cell line compared to using XC-302 alone.
evidence: beclin 1 in combination with XC-302 markedly accelerated proliferation and clone formation of the CNE-2 cell line compared to using XC-302
